item.title: Trump’s Threats to Greenland Raise Serious Questions for NATO
item.description: The treaty that created NATO did not contemplate an attack by one ally on another. A seizure of Greenland by President Trump would test the endurance ...

item.title: Mark Carney Heads to Beijing to Discuss Canada-China Relations as U.S. Outlook Darkens
item.description: The prime minister is seeking new markets for Canadian goods and to mend relations with China after years of deep acrimony between the two nations.

item.title: Why Greenland Matters for a Warming World

item.title: ‘We’re Not Stupid’: What Greenlanders Would Say to Trump
item.description: A visit to Greenland reveals a swirl of feelings as people nervously await talks with the Trump administration about the island’s future.
